contenido: Kodak Professional Portra 400 is a high-speed color negative film balanced for daylight. It offers a smooth and natural color palette, with vivid saturation and low contrast for accurate skin tones and consistent results.

Ilford Delta 3200 is a high-speed black-and-white film produced by Ilford Photo. It is designed for low-light conditions and situations where fast film is necessary. Here are some key characteristics of Ilford Delta 3200.

CineStill 800T is a unique film stock designed for motion picture use but adapted for still photography, is tungsten-balanced, which means it is designed to be used in indoor lighting situations where the light source has a more yellow or warm tone
